recipes.title: Classic Tomato Pasta
recipes.description: A simple yet delicious pasta dish with a rich tomato sauce, fresh basil, and a hint of garlic.
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute until fragrant.
Pour in the chopped tomatoes, bring to a simmer, and let it cook for 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
Meanwhile, cook the spaghetti according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
Stir the fresh basil into the tomato sauce and season with salt and pepper.
Add the cooked spaghetti to the sauce and toss to combine. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Spicy Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A quick and flavorful stir-fry with tender chicken, crisp vegetables, and a spicy sauce.
steps: In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, sriracha, honey, garlic, and ginger.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add the sliced chicken and cook until browned and cooked through. Remove from the wok and set aside.
Add the bell pepper, broccoli, and carrot to the wok and stir-fry for 3-5 minutes, until tender-crisp.
Return the chicken to the wok and pour the sauce over everything. Stir to coat and cook for another 1-2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast with Egg
recipes.description: A healthy and satisfying breakfast featuring creamy avocado, a perfectly cooked egg, and whole-grain toast.
steps: Toast the bread slices to your desired crispness.
While the bread is toasting, mash the avocado in a small bowl with the lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Cook the eggs to your liking (fried, poached, or scrambled).
Spread the mashed avocado evenly on the toasted bread.
Top each slice with an egg and a sprinkle of red pepper flakes.
Serve immediately for a delicious and nutritious breakfast.
